ComicInfo.Title: Cat Among the Pigeons [Episode 5]; Safe as Milk [Episode 4]; Cool for Cats [Episode 3]
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-05-15 14:38:46. [CVDB121207] Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-16 00:17:47. [Issue ID 262826]
ComicInfo.Characters: Cat Claw [Carol Conor],Inspector Battleball Bullet,Phil Fireball
ComicInfo.Summary:
Cat Among the Pigeons [Episode 5]: Cat Claw fights the members of Mr. Baldwin's gang while investigating the kidnapping of Connie Drake. Reporter Phil Fireball finds he can't keep up with her.
Safe as Milk [Episode 4]: Carol and Jeannie witness an apparent suicide and a kidnapping. Police Inspector Bullet questions them, but Carol decides to investigate further herself.
Cool for Cats [Episode 3]: Carol has broken into the Grey Institute to obtain bulletproof fabric to make a costume, but she meets the Werewolf, who is looking for a fight.
